oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Eddy Arnold Show - #098
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The Eddy Arnold Show #98, produced and transcribed in Nashville, TN. by Brown Radio Productions. Featuring Eddy Arnold and the Tennessee Plowboys, the Willis Brothers (introduced as the Oklahoma Wranglers), Roy Wiggins and host 'Pappy' Hal Horton. Opening theme music, 'Cattle Call'; closing theme music, 'Boil Them Cabbage Down'.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddy Arnold; Willis Brothers; Tennessee Plowboys; Oklahoma Wranglers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Hal Horton) -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (Eddy Arnold) -- Crazy Cause I Love You (Eddy Arnold ) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- Eddy Arnold talks -- Picture On The Wall (Eddy Arnold) -- Hal Horton talks -- Hal Horton introduces the Oklahoma Wranglers -- Rock Me To Sleep In My Saddle (Oklahoma Wranglers) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- Corinna, Corinna (Roy Wiggins steel guitar) -- Hal Horton talks -- Eddy Arnold talks -- Over The Hill (Eddy Arnold) -- Closing statement (Hal Horton and Eddy Arnold) -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Eddy Arnold Show (Radio program); Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; Horton, Hal, -1948; Tennessee Plowboys; Willis Brothers; Oklahoma Wranglers (Musical group); Wiggins, Roy;
